text: Thomas Robert "Tom" Laughlin (August 10, 1931 â€“ December 12, 2013) was an American actor, director, screenwriter, author, educator and political activist. He was known for his role as Billy Jack on the television series Billy Jack. He ran for President of the United States in 1992, 2004, and 2008 for the Democratic Party. Laughlin died of complications from pneumonia on December 12, 2013 at Los Robles Hospital and Medical Center in Thousand Oaks, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Billy Jack website, including information on Tom Laughlin's political aspirations * Category:1931 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Movie directors from Wisconsin Category:American television directors Category:Screenwriters from Wisconsin Category:American political activists Category:Educators from Milwaukee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Actors from Milwaukee Category:Writers from Milwaukee Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:2008 United States presidential candidates Category:Movie producers from Wisconsin
title: Tom Laughlin
